meta.title: Whisperglass Vale
meta.description: A lantern-lit valley where glass reeds sing in the wind. Your choices shape who you trust—and what wakes beneath the marsh.

scenes.title: Edge of the Vale
scenes.text: You arrive at Whisperglass Vale as dusk gathers. Pale reeds glitter like spun glass, chiming softly. A worn trail splits: one path hugs the marsh, the other climbs toward distant lights.

scenes.title: Marsh Breath
scenes.text: Mist curls around your boots. Something stirs under the water—ripples without wind. You spot a broken signpost: 'KEEP TO STONE'.

scenes.title: Lantern Hamlet
scenes.text: A small hamlet glows with amber lanterns. A tea-seller watches you from under a hood. A notice board lists: 'Missing: Glass-cutter Jori.'

scenes.title: Safe Steps
scenes.text: Flat stones form a hidden walkway. The mist thins. You find a silver charm snagged on a reed—warm to the touch.

scenes.title: Songs in the Glass
scenes.text: The reeds sing—almost like words. Your lantern flame bends sideways. For a heartbeat, you see footprints in the mist that are not yours.

scenes.title: The Name on the Board
scenes.text: The tea-seller says Jori went to the old marsh shrine to cut a mirror-stone and never returned. 'If you go,' they add, 'don’t bargain with echoes.'

scenes.title: Tea and Rumors
scenes.text: You sip smoky tea. Locals whisper about a bell beneath the marsh—ring it, and the vale answers with things you didn’t ask for.

choices.label: Seek the bell beneath the marsh
Ignore rumors and find the shrine

scenes.title: The Warm Charm
scenes.text: The charm hums faintly in your palm. The mist recoils, giving you a clearer view of a stone arch ahead—half-sunk, etched with spiral runes.

scenes.title: Shrine of Still Water
scenes.text: A shrine sits in knee-deep water. Offerings of glass beads glint on the altar. Behind it, a stair descends into darkness where the air feels older than the vale.

scenes.title: Answering Mist
scenes.text: A voice replies from everywhere at once: 'A trade for a path.' The mist forms a face and smiles without warmth.

scenes.title: Do Not Bargain
scenes.text: A simple rule seems to settle over the world: anything you promise here will be collected. The shrine stair waits, patient as stone.

choices.label: Go down to end this cleanly

scenes.title: The Bell Below
scenes.text: In a chamber beneath the marsh, a bronze bell hangs over black water. Beside it lies a cracked lantern and a glass-cutter’s tool—Jori’s. The bell sways as if it remembers being rung.\n\nEND OF MVP: Add more scenes and encounters next.
